paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on four BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and functional studies.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The history weighting algorithm called this variant benign based on the relative severity of personal and family cancer history for c.68-3T>G carriers compared to negative controls.

functional_data.summary: Partial splice defect with some functional transcript produced.

key_quotes: c.68-3T>G results in a partial splice defect.
The variant was classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS) in ClinVar.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 c.68-2A>G did not meet the threshold to be classified as benign by the history weighting algorithm.

functional_data.summary: In-frame cryptic acceptor utilized, producing aberrant transcripts.

variants.additional_notes: Trending benign but classified as VUS.
key_quotes: The sequence change affects the invariant AG dinucleotide of the splice acceptor.
Utilization of the cryptic splice site would produce a transcript with the in-frame deletion of two amino acids.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The history weighting algorithm analysis based on 10 observations.

functional_data.summary: Expected to cause skipping of exon 4, leading to pathogenic effects.

variants.population_frequency: Not present in large population databases
variants.additional_notes: Classified as likely pathogenic based on multiple lines of evidence.
key_quotes: c.425G>T was classified as likely pathogenic in ClinVar by six submitting laboratories.
Published RNA analysis showing skipping of exon 4 with predicted protein truncation.

functional_data.summary: Partial splice defect with some functional transcript produced.

variants.population_frequency: Not present in large population databases
variants.additional_notes: Classified as VUS due to conflicting evidence.
key_quotes: BRCA2 c.8331+2T>C may utilize a functional GC donor in place of the wild-type GT donor.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of evidence for variant classification.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text and tables.
